innerText.title: J-UniMorph Visualizer
innerText.explanationMessage:
This tool will be reset when you reload the page.
You can use the Enter key instead of pushing "Search" button and showing another meanings.
innerText.explanationStep1: This tool is for analyzing Japanese inflected forms and looking up their meanings.
innerText.explanationStep2: Enter an inflected form in the search box and click the "Search" button to display its meaning.
innerText.explanationStep3: Pink checkboxes indicate information about the meaning of the inflected form.
innerText.explanationStep4: At the same time, related words are displayed. The number indicates how commonly the inflected form is used (higher values indicates more used).
innerText.explanationStep5: If an inflected form has multiple meanings, you can switch the meaning to display.
innerText.explanationStep6: After searching, you can click the checkboxes to display other inflected forms with different labels.
innerText.inputTextLabel: Examples: 走りません，いらっしゃった，食べられる
innerText.showTextWarning:
The current version ONLY supports input in JAPANESE letters. 
If you cannot type in Japanese, please copy from J-UniMorph raw data or a webpage written in Japanese.
innerText.resultDisplay: Your search results will be displayed here.
innerText.relatedWords: Related words will be displayed here.
innerText.changedRelatedWords: If you change the checkbox after searching, the word form of the meaning will be displayed here.

translation.noMatchError: No match found. Please try another word.
translation.noMatchingChangeError: *No match found. Please try another checkbox combination.
